  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Activation Engineer",
  "description": "WIOCC is the leading player in the deployment of carrier-scale, future-proofed network infrastructure into Africa. We have the flexibility and scale to meet the ever-growing demand for reliable, high-speed capacity throughout Africa, driven by end consumers, enterprise users and the ecosystem that supports them. Our policy of continual investment in our network to create Africa&rsquo;s first, truly hyperscale network infrastructure means ongoing investment for growth, ensuring our readiness to meet the future data volume demands of end users throughout Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Activation Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Job type:&nbsp;Full-time
Reporting Line: Network Administrator

Job Objective


	To activate services on the WIOCC network and assist with network administration.


Key Duties and Responsibilities


	Implement network and service activations and restorations.
	Create service and network handover documentation.
	Ensure that the network diagrams are always up to date for all Network Layers (e.g. SDH, OTN, MPLS, DWDM).
	Ensure that services and networks are handed over accurately and timeously to the NOC when fully operational.
	Maintain accurate records of networks and services on OSS/BSS systems.
	Plan and implement planned engineering works (PEWs) as required.
	Address issues raised by the NOC, related to service and network configurations.
	Develop, implement and operationalize standards and processes for activations, network records, service records and handover documentation.
	Maintain a backup for all configurations done on each of the network equipment.
	Assist with the creation of ad hoc reports as needed.
	Actively use and ensure data integrity of OSS/BSS systems.


Requirements
Minimum Qualifications:


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Engineering or equivalent.
	Minimum of 5 years of technical experience in the telecom industry with at least 3 years in network provisioning/activation or similar role.
	Transmission Certifications - Ciena, Infinera, Tejas, Huawei.
	Expert understanding of Transmission (DWDM, OTN, SDH) networks.
	Expert understanding of OSS/BSS tools for Transmission (DWDM, OTN, SDH) networks.
	Expert knowledge of Tejas, Infinera or Ciena products, NMS and provisioning.
	Strong analytical and numerical skills, and able to collate and interpret data from various sources.
	Quick to understand technical issues and concepts.
	Expert in Microsoft Visio, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, and Microsoft PowerPoint.
	Effective written and verbal communication skills evidenced by previous work history and accomplishments.
	Excellent communications and presentation skills, including the ability to summarize and concisely share key information at all levels within the organization.
	Demonstrate ability to manage multiple priorities and solve problems in a fast-paced environment.
	Willing to work outside of normal office hours.


Experience and Skills:


	Has developed and operationalized standards for activations of Transmission (DWDM, OTN, SDH) networks.
	Has automated provisioning/reporting of network services and capacity.
	Has implemented PNI/LNI systems for Transmission (DWDM, OTN, SDH) networks.
	Knowledge of relational databases and data querying languages.


Attributes:


	Client-focused, relationship builder.
	Integrity, honesty, with high ethical standards.
	Boundless, passionate and flexible.
	Personal excellence, accuracy and attention to detail.
	Collaborative, achieve results through teamwork.
	Strong analytical skills and able to collate and interpret data from various sources.
	Good English language communicator with a natural aptitude for dealing with people.

Activation Engineer Job at WIOCC Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        WIOCC is the leading player in the deployment of carrier-scale, future-proofed network infrastructure into Africa. We have the flexibility and scale to meet the ever-growing demand for reliable, high-speed capacity throughout Africa, driven by end consumers, enterprise users and the ecosystem that supports them. Our policy of continual investment in our network to create Africa’s first, truly hyperscale network infrastructure means ongoing investment for growth, ensuring our readiness to meet the future data volume demands of end users throughout Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Activation Engineer
     

            
    



Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time
Reporting Line: Network Administrator

Job Objective


	To activate services on the WIOCC network and assist with network administration.


Key Duties and Responsibilities


	Implement network and service activations and restorations.
	Create service and network handover documentation.
	Ensure that the network diagrams are always up to date for all Network Layers (e.g. SDH, OTN, MPLS, DWDM).
	Ensure that services and networks are handed over accurately and timeously to the NOC when fully operational.
	Maintain accurate records of networks and services on OSS/BSS systems.
	Plan and implement planned engineering works (PEWs) as required.
	Address issues raised by the NOC, related to service and network configurations.
	Develop, implement and operationalize standards and processes for activations, network records, service records and handover documentation.
	Maintain a backup for all configurations done on each of the network equipment.
	Assist with the creation of ad hoc reports as needed.
	Actively use and ensure data integrity of OSS/BSS systems.


Requirements
Minimum Qualifications:


	Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or equivalent.
	Minimum of 5 years of technical experience in the telecom industry with at least 3 years in network provisioning/activation or similar role.
	Transmission Certifications - Ciena, Infinera, Tejas, Huawei.
	Expert understanding of Transmission (DWDM, OTN, SDH) networks.
	Expert understanding of OSS/BSS tools for Transmission (DWDM, OTN, SDH) networks.
	Expert knowledge of Tejas, Infinera or Ciena products, NMS and provisioning.
	Strong analytical and numerical skills, and able to collate and interpret data from various sources.
	Quick to understand technical issues and concepts.
	Expert in Microsoft Visio, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, and Microsoft PowerPoint.
	Effective written and verbal communication skills evidenced by previous work history and accomplishments.
	Excellent communications and presentation skills, including the ability to summarize and concisely share key information at all levels within the organization.
	Demonstrate ability to manage multiple priorities and solve problems in a fast-paced environment.
	Willing to work outside of normal office hours.


Experience and Skills:


	Has developed and operationalized standards for activations of Transmission (DWDM, OTN, SDH) networks.
	Has automated provisioning/reporting of network services and capacity.
	Has implemented PNI/LNI systems for Transmission (DWDM, OTN, SDH) networks.
	Knowledge of relational databases and data querying languages.


Attributes:


	Client-focused, relationship builder.
	Integrity, honesty, with high ethical standards.
	Boundless, passionate and flexible.
	Personal excellence, accuracy and attention to detail.
	Collaborative, achieve results through teamwork.
	Strong analytical skills and able to collate and interpret data from various sources.
	Good English language communicator with a natural aptitude for dealing with people.

Digital Media Manager Job at DM Holdings (DMH)




        
    

        
        DM Holdings (DMH) is a conglomerate of companies with vast interests in Entertainment and Media business. With each of the subsidiaries’ enviable track record, DMH is poised to take a strategic position in providing cutting edge services within the Media/Marketing Communication landscape.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Media Manager
Job Location: Ogba-Ojodu - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	Are you creative, strategic, and passionate about digital storytelling?
	We are looking for a Digital Media Manager to take charge of our online presence — someone who can blend creativity with analytics to drive engagement, growth, and impact.
	As a key member of our Social Media Team, you will shape the company’s digital voice, create engaging campaigns, and develop strategies that keep our audience inspired and connected.


What You’ll Do


	Develop and execute innovative digital and social media strategies that strengthen brand visibility and engagement.
	Create, schedule, and manage captivating content across multiple platforms (Instagram, Facebook, X, LinkedIn, YouTube, etc.).
	Track, measure, and analyze performance data to improve campaigns and deliver measurable results.
	Collaborate with internal teams to align content and campaigns with company goals and marketing objectives.
	Stay ahead of digital trends and technologies to ensure we’re always leading the conversation online.


What We’re Looking For


	A Bachelor’s Degree in Mass Communication, Computer Science, Marketing, or a related field.
	5–6 years of proven experience managing digital or social media platforms for brands or agencies.
	Solid understanding of social media analytics, trends, and advertising tools.
	Exceptional communication, organization, and storytelling skills.
	A results-driven mindset with a creative edge.
	Applicants must reside within or around Ikeja, Lagos.


What You’ll Gain


	Competitive and attractive remuneration package (negotiable based on experience).
	Opportunity to lead creative digital initiatives in a dynamic media environment.
	A vibrant, collaborative, and forward-thinking work culture.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@dmholdingslimited.com using "DM" as the subject of the mail.

Main Responsibilities


	Productivity: Operate assigned equipment in accordance with UL established SOP to desired result.

	Productivity: Operate, control, and monitor specialized machinery, technical equipment, or systems, which may include complex computer-controlled systems, manufacturing equipment, telecommunications systems, or other advanced technology
	Quality: drive reduction in material wastages keeping it at the lowest possible
	Quality: demonstrate good understanding of food safety and hygiene.
	Autonomous Maintenance: Implement CLIT as recommended by the Checklist and Tag abnormalities
	Setup and Configuration: Perform initial setup, configuration, and calibration of equipment to meet specific production or operational requirements.
	Monitoring and Troubleshooting: Continuously monitor equipment and systems to identify and address any deviations, malfunctions, or technical issues. Troubleshoot and resolve problems as they arise.
	Quality Assurance: Ensure that products or processes meet quality standards and specifications. Conduct quality checks and make adjustments as necessary.
	Preventive Maintenance: Perform routine and preventive maintenance tasks, including inspections, repairs, and component replacements, to maintain equipment in optimal condition.
	Safety Compliance: Strictly adhere to safety protocols, guidelines, and regulations. Ensure a safe working environment for oneself and colleagues.
	Data Management: Collect and record data related to equipment operation, maintenance, and performance. Generate reports and maintain records as required.
	Collaboration: Collaborate with technical teams, engineers, and supervisors to optimize equipment performance, troubleshoot complex issues, and implement process improvements.
	Training: Stay updated on the latest technical knowledge and undergo training to enhance skills and adapt to new technologies.


Experiences & Qualifications


	Candidates should possess an OND in Science / Engineering related fields.
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in food factory.
	Must be a current Technical Operator.
	Must be able to operate more than one machine technology such as RC, Teegarden, Ilapak etc.
	Applicants must be committed team worker with a strong sense of responsibility and good attention to detail.  Effective communication skills and an agile mind are essential.
	Must be flexible within pattern of shift work to accommodate factory shutdowns, training courses etc.


Skills:


	Problem Solving
	Manufacturing Technology
	Safety

	Computer related skills

	You are energized by delivering fantastic results. You are an example to others – both your results and your resilience.
